branchCategory.name: ASG, Stainless Steel Speed Controller, Elbow Type
branchCategory.bullets: <UL> <LI>Pressure range: 15 to 145 PSI (0.1 to 1 MPa) <LI>Ambient and fluid temp range: 23 to 140°F (-5 to 60°C) <LI>Option for meter-out or meter-in type control <LI>One-touch fitting provides easy tube mounting/removal <LI>Applicable tube size: ø4, ø6, ø8, ø10, and ø12 <LI>Thread port size: M5, R1/8 to 1/2 <LI>The port thread has sealant (except M5 type), to save installation time and reduce the possibility of leakage</LI></UL>
